Detailed Description

EditWidget is a thin veneer over TextWidget that configures itself to be editable. 

 void MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
   myEditWidget = new gaia::ui::EditWidget(static_cast<Page*>(this));
   myEditWidget->setHint("Please enter something here:");
   // you should delete myEditWidget somewhere
 }
